mapper.select: with all_dates(dates) as ( SELECT @date := DATE_ADD(@date, INTERVAL 1 DAY) AS dates FROM mysql.help_relation , (SELECT @date:= DATE_SUB(#{start_date}, INTERVAL 1 DAY)) d WHERE @date BETWEEN @date AND DATE_SUB(#{end_date}, INTERVAL 1 DAY) ) select dates, count(qc_compl_yn) as cnt from all_dates ad left outer join quest_content qc on (date_format(qc.updated_at, '%Y-%m-%d') = ad.dates and qc_compl_yn = 'Y' and u_id = #{u_id}) group by dates order by dates;
select ifnull(date_format(created_at, '%Y'), date_format(NOW(), '%Y')) as year from quest where u_id = #{u_id} group by year order by year desc
mapper.insert: insert into quest (q_div, q_d_date, q_wm_start, q_wm_end, u_id) values (#{q_div}, #{q_d_date}, #{q_wm_start}, #{q_wm_end}, #{u_id})

insert into quest_content (qc_content, q_id, u_id) values
(#{item}, #{q_id}, #{u_id})
mapper.update: update quest_content set qc_compl_yn = 'Y', updated_at = NOW() where qc_id = #{qc_id}

foreach.if: update quest_content set qc_content = #{item.qc_content}, qc_compl_yn = #{item.qc_compl_yn}, updated_at = NOW() where qc_id = #{item.qc_id}

mapper.select: select qc_compl_yn, count(*) as cnt from quest q left join quest_content qc on (qc.q_id = q.q_id) where q.u_id = #{u_id} and q_div = #{q_div} group by qc_compl_yn
